sentences.en: Characters can penalize close - combat opponent's accuracy by subtracting their Defense from his dice pool.
sentences.cn: 玩家能够降低对手近战攻击的精准度,通过在对手的DP中 减去玩家的防御.

sentences.en: He really ought to break them up, and penalize runners for even trying to fight.
sentences.cn: 他真的应该分开他们, 并且处罚赛跑者那怕仅仅是有打架的企图.

sentences.en: How can a referee penalize a player?
sentences.cn: 裁判怎样处罚犯规运动员?

sentences.en: It would be unfair to penalize those without a job.
sentences.cn: 失业人员待遇低下是不公平的.

sentences.en: It would define standards, police compliance and penalize delinquent firms.
sentences.cn: 该局将会设定标准, 让各个机构服从监管并且惩罚有过失的企业.

sentences.en: PENALIZE: a coat that is short or overall even.
sentences.cn: 处罚: 过短,过平的被毛.

sentences.en: Rain and snow do not penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.cn: 你的侦察和搜寻检定不再因雨和雪受到处罚.

sentences.en: The new law will penalize businesses that treat minorities unfairly.
sentences.cn: 新的法律将处罚对待少数不合理的公司.

sentences.en: The team was penalized for wasting time.
sentences.cn: 该队因拖延时间而受到处罚。

sentences.en: The third character: It will not be guilty . How to penalize luxury officers?
sentences.cn: 特色之三是大多“不会出事”. 奢侈了怎么处罚?

sentences.en: There is no more certain way to deter employment than to harass and penalize employers.
sentences.cn: 干扰和惩罚雇主是阻碍就业最明显的手段.

sentences.en: To penalize by fining or demanding forfeiture.
sentences.cn: 严禁不支付,违者处以没收之处罚.

sentences.en: Together with the union, we put some teeth into the rules to penalize the chronic offenders.
sentences.cn: 我们和工会一道严格地执行规定, 处分了长期违返纪律的人.

sentences.en: Women feel professionally penalized for taking time off to raise children.
sentences.cn: 女性认为休假带孩子在职业上对自己不利。

words.tran_cn: 惩罚，处罚；使…处于严重不利地位

trans.tran_en: to punish someone or treat them unfairly

trans.tran_cn: 对…予以惩罚，使处于不利地位
trans.tran_en: to punish someone or treat them unfairly
